author: Kelsey Tamakloe
statement: Protest video shows “resistance” to “President Macron’s plan for mandatory COVID vaccinations of all French citizens.”

author: Katie Sanders
statement: An image shows President Joe Biden touching Olivia Rodrigo’s shoulders during a White House press briefing.

author: Brandon Mulder
statement: "There is clear legal authority to handcuff and put in leg irons legislators that are trying to stop the legislature from being able to do business."

statement: “Newly obtained emails show UCSF harvesting the clitorises, testicles and penises of murdered babies.”

statement: Headlines show CNN published contradictory reports about hydroxychloroquine in 2020.

statement: "The government will be infiltrating” personal text messages.

author: Amy Sherman
statement: New and proposed state laws on voting mean “if you are going to be standing in that line for all those hours, you can’t have any water or any food.”

statement: Post says a recent bill passed, and “We get another stimulus check for $2500 at July 30, 2021”

author: Jason Asenso
statement: Federal agents are going “door-to-door coercing people to be injected with experimental drugs.”

author: Monique Curet
statement: Carbon dioxide “is not a problem. The Earth has more than enough land and ocean plant life to metabolize it.”

author: Paul Specht
statement: Says “showing up at the front doors of people’s houses and violating HIPAA laws by requesting private medical information regarding their vaccination status is unacceptable and illegal.”

statement: Says in February Facebook post that "Britney won."

statement: “BREAKING: Pennsylvania initiated a FULL audit of the RIGGED ELECTION”

statement: “Over 75% of (North Carolina) supports medical marijuana.”

statement: A bodyguard of a high-ranking Democrat in Congress fired the shot that killed Ashli Babbitt on Jan. 6.

author: Gabrielle Settles
statement: “There were no guns whatsoever” at the Capitol riot on Jan. 6.

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: "In 2020, more people voted in America than ever in the history of America, in the middle of a once-in-a-century pandemic."

statement: Says CNN reported that Joe Biden authorized “a U.S. intervention in Haiti after the assassination of President Jovenel Moïse.”

statement: Says this crowd video shows the ongoing protests in Cuba.

statement: Says Haitian President Jovenel Moïse was going to “expose Clinton Foundation fraud” before he was assassinated.

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: Says Facebook imposes a 7% limit on a user’s sharing.

author: Samantha Putterman
statement: Haiti, Tanzania and Madagascar refused the COVID-19 vaccines and now all three of their presidents have died unexpectedly.

author: Ciara O'Rourke
statement: “Lauren Boebert received a PPP loan for her restaurant.”

statement: The number of children in seven countries “missing so far this year” range from 20,000 to 460,000.

author: Emily Tian
statement: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome “is absolutely a side effect of vaccination.”

statement: A study found an “82% miscarriage rate” among women between 30 days and 20 weeks pregnant who got an mRNA COVID-19 vaccine.

statement: “In a now deleted Telegram post, former President Trump congratulated the Navy Seals on a ‘perfect beautiful whack’" in Haiti.

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: “We have now created over 3 million jobs since I took office, more jobs than have ever been created in the first five months of any presidency in modern history.”

statement: "Crime is escalating to a level we haven’t seen in decades as a direct result of Democrats’ defund the police movement and Biden-Harris open-border policies."

statement: News organizations and sponsors ignored the accomplishments of Kim Rhode, a six-time Olympic medalist, because of her support of the Second Amendment.
